test.name: Post request to create new customer

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8080/customers/add path_url=/customers/add headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

test.name: Post request to create new film

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://127.0.0.1:8080/films/add path_url=/films/add headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.2', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '50', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"title": "IT", "type": "Old", "items_total": "5"}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
